lines.text: You know, Captain, every year of my life I grow more and more convinced that the wisest and the best is to fix our attention on the good and the beautiful. If you just take the time to look at it.
try to outrun them, or turn and fight! What would you do?
It's quiet and lonely out here, and frankly we'll be happy to get back to that dreary old moon.
It's true that our technology may be further advanced than yours, but then strange things happened.

We let our machines do all our work. People on Rheton became completely free of all labor, practically of all responsibility. Our people became soft and lazy. They did not know how to cope with their free time. They started to fight among themselves.
too much free time, too little work.
A problem not at all unique in the history of the universe.
We are able to translate all languages with voice tone waves.
There are many things you will not understand here. Maybe in time you shall.
What the future will reveal of this story is only the beginning, only the beginning, only the beginning...
